title: homebrew jenkins nodes don't have /usr/local/bin in PATH

content.raw:
This is wreaking havoc when trying to `hg clone` the release-tools repo, since mercurial is being installed by homebrew into `/usr/local`.

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder_el_capitan/10/console

I manually modified the configuration of that job to use `/usr/local/bin/hg`, but we need a better solution. This is on the `sentinel` node. For some reason, t1000 has mercurial installed to `/usr/bin`.
